ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces coffee-flavored liqueur (such as KahluaÂ®)
1 fluid ounce white creme de cacao
des: "Who says you can't get a jolt of caffeine with your cocktail? Add a shot of espresso to this chocolatey drink for an added pick-me-up."
ins: Combine espresso, vodka, coffee liqueur, creme de cacao, and ice in a cocktail shaker. Cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass.
